titles.title: Once I was Dead (easy familiar tune)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And can it be that He loved me And gave Himself for me And can it be that He loved me And gave Himself for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once I was dead in sin And hope within me died But now I'm dead to sin With Jesus crucified{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O height I cannot reach O depth I cannot sound O love - O boundless love In my Redeemer found{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I live - and yet not I But Christ that lives in me Who from the law of sin And death has made me free{/lang-eng}
